intro.description: Defense Base Act (DBA) talepleri konusunda uzmanlaşmış, iş yerinde yaralanma veya hastalık yaşayan çalışanlara hukuki destek sağlıyoruz.
intro.expertiseDesc: Ekibimiz, karmaşık DBA davalarında geniş deneyime sahip olup, süreç boyunca haklarınızın korunmasını sağlar.
intro.supportDesc: İlk başvurudan nihai karara kadar, davanıza özel ilgiyle tüm süreç boyunca size rehberlik ediyoruz.

applicationRequirements.title: Application Requirements
applicationRequirements.description: To complete your application, we'll need the following documents. Please ensure you have these ready before proceeding.
applicationRequirements.warning: Your application may be delayed or cannot be completed if you're unable to upload the required documents.

documents.title: Passport and Travel Records
documents.description: Your passport and entry-exit records from the period you worked at the bases

documents.title: Employment Documents
documents.description: Documents showing your employment with the company and your position (employment contracts, assignment letters, etc.)

documents.title: Recognition Documents
documents.description: If available, any recognition, appreciation, or achievement certificates from your workplace

documents.title: Payment Records
documents.description: Bank statements or payment records showing your salary payments
